price: 28. Nuosaikiausias iš jų tarė: „Argi nesakiau jums, kodėl jūs nešlovinate (Allaho)?“
arabic: قَالَ أَوۡسَطُهُمۡ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكُمۡ لَوۡلَا تُسَبِّحُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla awsaṭuhum alam aqul lakum lawlā tusabbiḥūna
